translations: 煮熟的糖渍水果；高脚果盘

sentences.sentence: People make different cornel jams and compotes, but we will tell how to make cornel vodka!
sentences.translation: 人们用它来做各种果酱和蜜饯，但我们要告诉你怎样做山茱萸伏特加！

sentences.sentence: We were given a choice between a classic English breakfast or breakfast cereals with a selection of fruit compotes.
sentences.translation: 这里准备了两种早餐，一种是传统的英式早餐，另外的就是水果加酸奶麦片。

sentences.sentence: Cornel is sour, but tasty and healthy berry. People make different cornel jams and compotes, but we will tell how to make cornel vodka!
sentences.translation: 山茱萸这种浆果味酸，但好吃且有益健康。人们用它来做各种果酱和蜜饯，但我们要告诉你怎样做山茱萸伏特加！
